item.title: Welcome to Sunshine Group of Institutions

item.content:encoded:
Sunshine Group of Institutions is a landmark for many Scientists, Engineers, and successful Graduates and Post-Graduates. Rendering the best educational practices with all the state of art technologies for the last two years, it has been a knowledge tree for winners in their careers and life.

admissions

Join of the world of opportunities, choose and follow your passions. You take a call on your subjects and streams leave the rest to college it gives wings for you to reach greater heights.

Learning is always been a joy in Sunshine group of Institutions. Making students feel ebullience making them feel home at campus is our core objective. Other than academic excellence, college strives for all round and enhanced performance of students in every corner.

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: eswarspace
item.content:encoded:
CORE VALUES

“India is unity in diversity”

The Sunshine Group of Institutions admired this proudly and made this unity in diversity as a motto and an integral part of their core values. The college always represented all sections and regions of people. It has been hub for many interstate and foreign students.

Our Mission

Institution greatest mission would be to form the superior team of human resources and facilitate students with innovative infrastructure. Later, providing best knowledge in their respective fields to the peers and empowering them for life

Our VISION

The institution envisions being a pioneer in the educational service. Always believed education is what changes the world out there and this has to be accessible to all. Our institution empowers everyone to access education as his or her right and delivers it as an utmost priority service.

item.title: Admissions
item.dc:creator: eswarspace
item.content:encoded:
Join of the world of opportunities, choose and follow your passions. You take a call on your subjects and streams leave the rest to college it gives wings for you to reach greater heights.

courses offered

Institution with lot of research and team of highly intellectual people in the education field curated these courses. The main objective of institution is to shape the future. Keeping in view of future prospects and technologically advance requirements, design of courses is structured.

There are two categories of courses offered by the institution. They are UG and PG courses.

Under Graduate Courses:

Bachelor of Engineering

Bachelor of Pharmacy

Bachelor of Sciences and Arts

Post Graduate Courses:

Master of Engineering

Master of Pharmacy

Master of Sciences and Arts.

Admission procedure

Getting into one of the finest colleges requires talent and skill. In this competitive world, the college provides equal opportunity to everyone. The admission procedure starts with the talent entrance exam conducted all over India by Sunshine group of Institutions. The exam is named as SGIT (Sunshine group of Institution test) to be admitted into technical courses everyone must score their qualified marks. The State and central entrance examinations are took in consideration in admission process.

Download form or apply online

Reach out to SGI web portal for the application form for your favorite course and download your form for offline submission. If you wish to apply online, go to separate link in the web portal and follow the navigation tour for your successful application submission.

item.title: Campus Life
item.dc:creator: eswarspace
item.content:encoded:
Learning is always been a joy in Sunshine group of Institutions. Making students feel ebullience making them feel home at campus is our core objective. Other than academic excellence, college strives for all round and enhanced performance of students in every corner.

Gymnasium

Our college always strives for the complete wellbeing of our college community and best example for it is the Gymnasium in the campus. Gymnasium in the campus is all equipped with German imported tools. The design of it is inspired from indoor stadiums of the great Olympics. Play your indoor games like Table Tennis, Chess, Caroms, and if you are in a mood to lift then hit the gym and power up muscles.

Play grounds

The college has finest grounds for the students to engage in sports and guides them to excel in sports of their choice. The physical department and headed by sports coaches thrive to bring out the best in students and make them to represent sports at any level. The Basketball court, Tennis lawn and the Cricket and Football grounds resemble the college core principles in encouraging sports culture in the campus.

Cafeteria

The college’s most iconic and picturesque is the cafeteria building. The building design and the theme highlights the importance of food. It also displays how the food from the ages is cultured. The cafeteria caters all students across all the regions with favorite and reminisces home food. It provides the hygienic food and the seating allows any number of students to have their best meal.

STUDENT CLUBS

The student clubs are our student’s favorite destine. There are so many student clubs in the campus to collaborate all department students and organize any event in the campus. Sports clubs enhances and finds the spirit of students to enroll, play and win in their games and in their life’s too. It has been great learning journey for every student club member to learn all the teamwork related skills required in the real world. Student clubs in our campus imbibe leadership qualities in them and gives them the power to fight for any wrong doings and it starts here right away.

item.title: infrastructure and facilities
item.dc:creator: eswarspace
item.content:encoded:
Human is the most sophisticated creature ever existed in this whole universe. Human being is the manifestation of the greatest nature around us.

In the same, way how our human body created and organized. The college took it as inspiration in creating an organization with all the sophistication and functioning.

Classrooms

It is where all the rays of knowledge starts shining. The state of art classrooms represent college’s true nature. They are the Success stories. They are pillars of our college’s growth and they are our key to development.

The design of classrooms represent the greatest quality of learning. Seating arrangement to view of boards take, you to the other mind space with full of imagination and curiosity.

Department Labs

Every department has its own lab. The mechanical lab in the college is the most celebrated. Its establishment costed the exchequer with five crores of rupees. The machinery which Sunshine group of Institutions installed in the mechanical lab are all imported from Japan.

It is the dream of every mechanical engineer in the world to have hands on experience with those machines. Not only Mechanical and the Computer lab in the campus is the next substitute of the Indian silicon valley. Each department complement themselves with their labs in bringing the best out of every student at Sunshine Group of Institutions.

 Incubation Centre

The incubation Centre in the campus is the factory of start-ups. The Centre turn the dreams of students into reality and empowers them to be entrepreneurs. Many professors of college as mentors back the Research and Development.

Auditorium

The greatest minds come together to share their ideas, to learn something new, to gain insights from our successful alumni on achieving great. All this happens in our state of art auditorium. The auditorium represents the sunshine group of institutions pride. The design of auditorium is inspired from the greatest auditoriums around the world. It is the largest and can fit in six hundred people at a time. It is a place our students shine their talents and make way from that stage to world stage.
